<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><b><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当我们想要搜索某些内容时，我们第一个想到的就是打开<span lang="EN-US">Google</span>、百度或必应这类的搜索引擎。但针对有些内容，却是这些常规搜索引擎无法获取到的，那就是隐藏在深网的内容。据不完全统计，深网的信息量为表层网络的<span lang="EN-US">500</span>倍。那么，深网主要都包含了些什么内容呢？其实，深网主要包括的都是些，例如需要某些条件如注册、付费，才能访问的内容，如数据库和某些服务等。而常规搜索引擎通常只会对静态网页进行抓取，而对于这些存储在数据库中的内容，对其而言几乎是不可见的。其次，当我们使用<span lang="EN-US">Google</span>时，<span lang="EN-US">Google</span>还可能对我们的活动轨迹进行跟踪。这对于要求匿名的用户而言，也是不可接受的。</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 22.5pt; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 250); vertical-align: baseline; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;
border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">为什么<span lang="EN-US">Google</span>搜索不到深网的内容？</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">这是因为所有的<span lang="EN-US">Deb</span>网站（</span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="https://torlinksccquz7bi.onion.link/"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#24890D;letter-spacing:.4pt;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt">.onion</span></b></a></span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）都是没有索引的，而正常的搜索引擎通常都是通过目标网页索引来获取内容的。因此对于没有索引的搜索结果则不会被<span lang="EN-US">Google</span>所收录。此外，在搜索过程中还会和服务器建立连接，这样对我们的隐私和安全也带来了一定的隐患。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“据研究人员介绍，只有<span lang="EN-US">4</span>％的互联网对公众可见，剩下的<span lang="EN-US">96</span>％的网站和数据则隐藏在<span lang="EN-US">Deep web</span>。”<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">此外，深网中还包含了许多非法内容，例如毒品，武器交易，高度成熟的黑客工具，色情，军事机密等。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; line-height: 22.5pt; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 250); vertical-align: baseline; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">robots</span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">robots.txt</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是搜索引擎中访问网站的时候要查看的第一个文件。<span lang="EN-US">robots.txt</span>文件会告诉蜘蛛程序，在服务器上什么文件是可以被查看<span lang="EN-US">/</span>禁止查看的。如果某些页面被设为不可查看，那么搜索引擎也是无法正常获取到的。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">说了这么多，那么有没有既可以保证高度匿名性，又可以获取到深网内容的搜索引擎呢？下面，我将为大家推荐十款比<span lang="EN-US">Google</span>，必应更加“强大”搜索引擎：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 22.5pt; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 250); vertical-align: baseline; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;
border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1. </span></b><span lang="EN-US"><a href="https://pipl.com/"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#24890D;letter-spacing:.4pt;
border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;padding:0cm;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">pipl</span></b></a></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
